summary: Feature request to expose update-with-start operations via the TypeScript SDK. This capability allows workflows to be updated or created in a single operation, combining workflow execution initiation with state updates.
userImpact: Users cannot currently use update-with-start operations in TypeScript SDK, limiting their ability to atomically create and update workflows in a single call.
resolutionDetails: Update-with-start operations were implemented and exposed via the SDK API
keyQuote: Expose update-with-start operations via the SDK
